unit_rules.name: Teleport Homer
unit_rules.text: When deploying this unit, place this unit's Teleport Homer token anywhere on the Battlefield except your opponent's deployment zone. Once per battle, you may move this unit to the Teleport Homer token. Position this unit within 3" of the token. Remove the token from the Battlefield.

unit_rules.name: Fury of the First
unit_rules.text: When attacking, you may choose to ignore any modifiers to Hit rolls and/or to the attack's Ranged Skill or Melee Skill.

unit_rules.name: Wrath of the First
unit_rules.text: Add +1 to the Hit roll of attacks made against your army's Oath of Moment target.
